description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.archetypes.Item.XQRMnEeFugGyDUfq]{Steward Officer}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.archetypes.Item.rWWHflreHCbMZVFm]{Stewards Infiltrator}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.archetypes.Item.2zjfszFAX3NdZefF]{Stewards Stalwart}

You gain @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.LeZmnFwnlB89ovBB]{Culture} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.1tzIBDaDAO4hmX5C]{Diplomacy} as class skills. For each of these skills that is already a class skill for you (or becomes a class skill) from a source other than this archetype, you learn to speak and read a new language. In addition, you can use Diplomacy in place of @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.6fqgiVqlA7u9jS4i]{Intimidate} for checks to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.6fqgiVqlA7u9jS4i#demoralize]{demoralize} and Culture for @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.tVUA3IPcOfyU1g19]{Life Science} checks to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.IdprCKGj66qptyN5]{identify} humanoids and monstrous humanoids. When you fail a Diplomacy check to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.1tzIBDaDAO4hmX5C#change-attitude]{change a creature’s attitude}, the creature’s attitude worsens only if you fail the check by 10 or more.
